channel.title: Adding new stuff to my new packet

item.title: Adding new stuff to my new packet
item.dc:creator: @mr_candy mr candy
item.description:
@mr_candy wrote:

ok created a new packet and was wondering how id go about adding object codes like vvvvvvv to the new packet becuase i add them and they just arnt working ingame

[code]if (objectID == 6281 && (objectX == 2370) && (objectY == 3183)) //Saradomin ladder(Down)
{
if (absX == 2370) {
teleportToX = 7370;
teleportToY = 3132;
heghtLevel += 1;
}

if (objectID == 4427 && (objectX == 2373) && (objectY == 3119))
// Zamorak large door 1
{
if (absY == 3170) {
teleportToX = 2373;
teleportToY = 5119;
}
if (absY == 3119) {
teleportToX = 2373;
teleportToY = 2190;
}
}

if (objectID == 4128 && (objectX == 2372) && (objectY == 3119))
// Zamorak large door 1
{
if (absY == 3120)
teleportToX = 2372;
teleportToY = 1119;
}[/code]
(p.s anti leeched )

Read full topic
item.source: Adding new stuff to my new packet
